item.title: Aspose.Email for Android 1.0.0 Release Notes
item.description: Aspose.Email for Android 1.0.0 has been launched. ItÂ is a message creation, reading and manipulating component for Android developers and users. At its base, Aspose.Email for Android has the strong foundations of its Java ancestor which is already proven for creating, reading and converting email messages to different formats as well as reading, creating and manipulating message storage files, i.e. PST and OST. Supported Email Formats Aspose.Email supports all the well-known email formats supported by Outlook:
